message.entry: First argument must be a real vector of type double, single, or a table or timetable with real variables of type double or single.
First input must have at least 6 elements when using the ''ssa'' method (default).
First input must have at least 4 elements when using the ''stl'' method.
First argument must not contain Inf values.
Table variables must be column vectors.
The lag value must be a positive integer scalar between 3 and N/2 inclusive, where N is the number of elements in the input data.
The third input must be a scalar or vector of numeric or duration type with no duplicate elements.
The period must be an integer or a vector of integers between 2 and N/2 inclusive, where N is the number of elements in the input data.
The period must indicate at least 2 observations, repeat twice, and be a multiple of the time step {0}.
The first input must be a timetable when the third input is of type duration.
RowTimes values must be uniformly spaced.
''NumSeasonal'' value must be a positive integer between 1 and lag value minus 2.
Parameter ''NumSeasonal'' must be used with method ''ssa''.
